alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 3:02PM CDT until March 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and north central and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 1 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
